body:
@probonopd,
Thanks for having already signed the Contribution License Agreement. Your agreement was validated by Microsoft. We will now review your pull request.
_Thanks,
Microsoft Pull Request Bot_

The `WARNING: Building for Ubuntu 16.04!` looks suspicious, can you build for 14.04?
@probonopd sorry was in meetings rest of day and then we got hit by snow over here, working on this today

This time `cp: cannot stat ‘../powershell_*_amd64.deb’: No such file or directory` means that you are missing the PowerShell deb to begin with...
Ok, got it working by running tool/appimage.sh from root of repo folder rather than inside the tools folder.   Tested the AppImage and worked fine on 14.04.  Thanks @probonopd
Worked on 16.04 after running script from root of repo.
@andschwa anything else you need before we merge this?
@andschwa since you're the maintainer assigned to this, can you merge :)
